description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2022-11-14 by 2pm EST. All bids submitted after 2pm EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. This solicitation is for the requirement of pallet racking.
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Supply of Pallet Racking
### Notice Information
* **Reference Number:** WS3661625554-Doc3662562650
* **Amendment Number:** 9
* **Bid Closing Date and Time:** November 14, 2022, 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
### Tender Information
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Tender Status:** Expired
### Goods and Services
* **Commodity:** Pallet Racking
* **UNSPSC Code:** 56111803 (Freestanding storage)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
### Contract Details
* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entity Name:** Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)
* **End User Entity Address:** 200 Kent St. Station 13E228, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E6, Canada
### Contact Information
* **Contact Name:** Karen Bromley, PSPC/SPAC
* **Contact Email:** [karen.bromley@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:karen.bromley@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone:** Not provided
* **Contact Address:** Not provided

### bidding instructions
To submit a proposal, bidders must do the following from November 14, 2022, 14:00:00 until the end of this solicitation:
- The proponents will submit the complete proposal as per the Notice of Proposal.
- It is the responsibility of the bidders to address all requirements of this notice,

Ensure you review the full legal documents of this Request for Proposal. The original documentation can be viewed on the Ariba Discovery website: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14086777?extsite=MTQwODY3NzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://
